allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
feat: Add test stage to all three DVC pipelines

- Add pytest test stage to dvc_basic.yaml (Stage 6)
- Add pytest test stage to dvc_with_drift.yaml (Stage 9)
- Add pytest test stage to dvc_with_mlflow.yaml (Stage 6)

Test stage runs: pytest tests/ -v --tb=short --cov=src
Dependencies: tests/, src/, scripts/, and config/params.yaml

Now all DVC pipelines include unit testing at the end, matching
the complete workflow behavior of ''docker-run.ps1 all'' command.
